Loading libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(gbm)
```

Importing data
```{r}
f <- read_csv("raw.sr.bodysize.sharkabundance.csv")
```

Plotting densities of species richness, body size, and shark abundance:

Species Richness
```{r}
#Species Richness
sr.density <- density(f$SR, from = 0)
sr.density.plot <- plot(sr.density)
```

Body Size
```{r}
#Species Richness
body.size.density <- density(f$MaxL)
body.size.density.plot <- plot(body.size.density)
```

Shark Abundance
```{r}
#Species Richness
shark.abundance.density <- density(f$TaSharks)
shark.abundance.density.plot <- plot(shark.abundance.density)
#graph is weird, includes zeros in the calculation for some reason
```
